src:
Prediksi Bayern Munchen vs Olympiakos 7 November 2019
05 Nov 2019, 15:16 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bayern Munchen baru saja berpisah dengan sang pelatih Niko Kovac. Namun, itu tak mengubah target mereka. Meladeni Olympiakos, Die Roten mengincar kemenangan. Tambahan tiga poin akan meloloskan raksasa Bavaria ke babak 16 besar Liga Champions dengan dua laga tersisa.
Pemimpin klasemen Bayern Munchen akan menjamu tim juru kunci Olympiakos di Allianz Arena pada matchday 4 Grup B Liga Champions 2019/20, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Pada matchday 3, Bayern mengalahkan Olympiakos 3-2 di Yunani lewat dua gol Robert Lewandowski dan satu gol Corentin Tolisso. Tuan rumah mencetak dua gol lewat Youssef El-Arabi dan Guilherme.
Bayern pun memimpin klasemen dengan poin sempurna 9, diikuti Tottenham (4), Red Star Belgrade (3), dan Olympiakos (1).
Bayern, yang saat ini ditangani asisten pelatih dan caretaker Hans-Dieter Flick, akan mengunci kelolosan jika mampu mengalahkan Olympiakos di Allianz Arena. Bayern juga bisa lolos dengan hasil imbang, jika Tottenham mengalahkan tuan rumah Red Star Belgrade di partai lainnya.
text:
Predictions of Bayern Munich vs Olympiacos November 7, 2019
05 Nov 2019, 15:16 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bayern Munich just parted ways with coach Niko Kovac. However, that did not change their target. Serve Olympiakos, Die Roten eyeing victory. An additional three points will pass the Bavarian giants into the last 16 of the Champions League with two matches remaining.
Leaders Bayern Munich will host the Olympiakos caretaker team at the Allianz Arena on Matchday 4 Group B Champions League 2019/20, Thursday (11/07/2019).
On Matchday 3, Bayern beat Olympiakos 3-2 in Greece with two goals from Robert Lewandowski and one from Corentin Tolisso. The host scored twice through Youssef El-Arabi and Guilherme.
Bayern also lead the standings with perfect points 9, followed by Tottenham (4), Red Star Belgrade (3), and Olympiakos (1).
Bayern, who are currently being handled by assistant coach and caretaker Hans-Dieter Flick, will lock in the break if they are able to defeat Olympiakos at the Allianz Arena. Bayern can also qualify with a draw, if Tottenham beat host Red Star Belgrade in the other party.
